subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-46822 is on the way
raw_subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-46822 is on the way
description:
Hi - I received a text message and email from fed ex regarding scheduling a delivery for a package. Wanted to check here first, because all of the information you have sent stated that someone would CALL to schedule. There are a lot of scams using fedex as bait and I just wanted to confirm with you that this is part of the normal process. Also, the email/text did not include the order number you provided. This is the message from fedex:

Your shipment 284333048117 (https://click.message.fedex.com/?qs=4e4be66d506b36d3df83e2c691b341d77d578be37af153a1b9a702afdb7ce93a5a797dc310fcddc5243f96b0fc9c8136710244240f63f09b9540ef5a62d565cd) is in transit to you.
Please schedule your delivery details.

It's easy. Follow the link below to choose your delivery date and time. Deliveries are scheduled for two-hour windows. Click below to get started.


On Wed, Jan 15, 2025 at 1:23 PM Eureka Ergonomic <customerservice@eurekaergonomic.com> wrote:

Order EE-46822

Your order is on the way

Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status.
